original_text: “You shall not oppress a sojourner. You know the heart of a sojourner, for you were sojourners in the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 너는 이방 나그네를 압제하지 말라 너희가 애굽 땅에서 나그네 되었었은즉 나그네의 사정을 아느니라

sentences.original_text: You shall not oppress a sojourner.
You know the heart of a sojourner
for you were sojourners in the land of Egypt.
